metadata title = "Carseats-Training_Validation_Test"

```{r}

library(ISLR)
library(caret)
data("Carseats")
set.seed(123)

## Partition Carseats into Temp and Test, 0.75 found a closer number of rows than did 0.80
train_Index <- createDataPartition(Carseats$Sales, p = 0.75, list = FALSE)

Temp <- Carseats[train_Index,]
test <- Carseats[-train_Index,]
nrow(Temp)
nrow(test)
```
```{r}
## To avoid duplicate records, partition Temp into Training and Validation. 2/3 for Training
train_Index_Temp <- createDataPartition(Temp$Sales, p = 2/3, list = FALSE)

Training <- Temp[train_Index_Temp, ]
Validation <- Temp[-train_Index_Temp, ]

## To verify the sizes of the dataset

nrow(Training)
nrow(Validation)
nrow(test)
```
